0.98.text:
“If you sit by the river long enough, you will see the body of your enemy float by”
Japanese Proverb

32.22.text: Then they came for my family

43.16.text: And now they've taken the one person who means more to me than anyone else in the world

53.50.text: They think they can beat me down

58.78.text: They will do anything to win

63.44.text: But there's one thing they didn't count on...

84.66.text: The Final Book in the International Bestselling Series
